title: Shefa Dashboard Product Tests
description: BDD product tests validating the Shefa dashboard displays and functions correctly
content:
Feature: Shefa Dashboard
  As a community participant
  I want to view the Shefa dashboard
  So that I can see community metrics and my participation

  @smoke @shefa @navigation
  Scenario: Shefa dashboard route is accessible
    Given I am on the home page
    When I navigate to "/shefa"
    Then the page should load successfully
    And the page should not show an error message

  @shefa @navigation
  Scenario: Dashboard displays after navigation
    Given I am on the Shefa dashboard
    Then the dashboard should display
    And no loading spinner should be visible

  @shefa @navigation
  Scenario: Navigation to Shefa from main nav
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click on "Shefa" in the navigation
    Then I should be on the "/shefa" page
    And the page should load successfully

  @shefa @data
  Scenario: Dashboard content renders without errors
    Given I am on the Shefa dashboard
    Then the page should be accessible
    And there should be no console errors
